name: 'KNEEL BEFORE YOUR KING!' Unisex T-shirt
description:
Screen printed onto a Gildan Softstyle T-shirt for extreme comfort and style! 

SMALL- 34"/36"

MEDIUM- 38"/40"

LARGE- 42"/44"

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Heavy heart Apparel is back with a ROAR!!!

"Kneel Before Your King" 

Want a T- shirt that makes you stand out in a crowd?
A T-shirt that is a truly unique design and only available through Heavy Heart Apparel
Then purchase our Tee and you wont be disappointed!

The tee's are designed by our in house artist Alex who then has them professionally manufactured. 

Because these tees are original & unique you can be assured the design can not be found elsewhere!

So take a look .... Don't be shy, the tee won't bite!

"Kneel before your King" is the debut design with more to come.

The tee's come in small, medium & large sizes. Each t- shirt costs £7.99 plus £2.00 postage & packing. 

The tee will come in a waterproof sealed bag.
We will aim for next day postage once we receive your order, the delivery should be around 2 to 3 working days but we can not guarantee this, it's all according how slow your postman/woman walks!

Thank you for supporting Heavy Heart Apparel.
